entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
